name: Hunted (itch) (Mr Afroduck)
description:
- Includes audio

Entry for Curdle Jam #11, themed "Ahead of the Game".

I made myself laugh making this...

Created by Oscar North (Mr_Afroduck). It's my first time modelling anything in Blender, and also my first time using the 3D side of Godot, but I'm pleased with the result.

Played with keyboard controls.

Don't forget to check out: twitch.tv/curdlegames!

Hope you enjoy!
